name: pca
label: PCA
description: The implementation of the principal component analysis, for feature reduction

inputs.name: ts_list
inputs.label: TS list
inputs.description: The list of TS to reduce. TS must be aligned !

parameters.name: n_components
parameters.label: Number of components
parameters.description: Number of principal components to keep

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Name of the table to create (contains variance explained)
parameters.label: Table name

parameters.name: fid_pattern
parameters.description: Python pattern determining format of output functional identifiers. Example : PC_{pc_id}, where '{pc_id}' is the id of the principal component created (from 1 to n component)
parameters.label: FuncId pattern

outputs.name: ts_list
outputs.label: TS list
outputs.description: TS list resulting from a PCA operation (reduction) on the inputed ts_list. Produce `n_components` TS, with the same number of points than input TS.

outputs.name: Variance explained table
outputs.label: Table
outputs.description: Table containing the variance explained, and the cumulative var. explained for each PC
